title: Red Hat Certified System Administrator
description: Validates core system administration skills for Red Hat Enterprise Linux environments.

title: Red Hat Certified Engineer
description: Focuses on automation with Ansible and advanced system administration tasks.

title: Red Hat Certified Architect
description: Top-level certification achieved by earning multiple credentials in specialized domains.

title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in OpenShift Administration
description: Demonstrates knowledge in managing OpenShift Container Platform clusters.

title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in OpenShift Application Development
description: Covers designing, building, and deploying containerized applications using OpenShift.

title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in Deployment and Systems Management
description: Tests skills in deploying and managing systems using Red Hat Satellite.

title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in Containers
description: Tests knowledge of container fundamentals including podman, customizing, running, managing containerized services.

title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in OpenShift Virtualization
description: Skills to plan, deploy and manage virtual machines using the OpenShift Virtualization operator in OCP.

title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in ROSA
description: Covers skills to deploy and manage Red Hat OpenShift Service on AWS (ROSA).

title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in OpenShift AI
description: Deploy and manage AI workloads using OpenShift AI, including training, serving, and managing machine learning models.
